 short[] readDataFile()
          Method to read to a short type array from a data file The code uses a DataInputStream to read short type data from the file data/completeData.dat All samples in the file are read to an ArrayList before being copied to the short data array.

          Method to save the short array to a data file The code uses a DataOutputStream to send short type data to the file data/completeData.dat All samples in the extracted short array are written to file

Method Detail

act

public void act()
This method is called by the Greenfoot framework. To hide an image load the foreground image with the picture class pick() method and then press the act button. You can save the displyed image using the picture class write method.

Overrides:
act in class Picture

extract4bitData

public void extract4bitData()
Method to extract short array data from the low 4 bits of this picture. Each pixel contains one short value.

extract4bitImage

public void extract4bitImage()
Method to extract hidden image from lowest 4 bits. This method uses 1D arrays and requires a 1028x720 pixel image.

hide2D4bitImage

public void hide2D4bitImage(Picture hiddenImage)
Method to hide newBg image in the low 4 bits of this picture. This method uses 1D arrays and requires a 1028x720 pixel image.

hide4bitData

public void hide4bitData()
Method to hide short array data in the low 4 bits of this picture. Each pixel contains one short value.

hide4bitImage

public void hide4bitImage(Picture newBg)
Method to hide newBg image in the low 4 bits of this picture. This method uses 1D arrays and requires a 1028x720 pixel image.

readDataFile

public short[] readDataFile()
Method to read to a short type array from a data file The code uses a DataInputStream to read short type data from the file data/completeData.dat All samples in the file are read to an ArrayList before being copied to the short data array.

writeDataFile

public void writeDataFile(short[] outArray)
Method to save the short array to a data file The code uses a DataOutputStream to send short type data to the file data/completeData.dat All samples in the extracted short array are written to file
